/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApApvLnGrpDDao.selectApApvLnGrpD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.APVR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) APVR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'APVR_ROLE_CD' AND CD = M.APVR_ROLE_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) APVR_ROLE_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'DBL_APV_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.DBL_APV_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) DBL_APV_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'ABS_RSON_CD' AND CD = M.ABS_RSON_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ABS_RSON_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.APV_LN_GRP_ID, T.APV_LN_GRP_SEQ, T.APVR_UID, T.APV_DEPT_ID, T.APVR_DEPT_YN, T.APVR_ROLE_CD, T.DBL_APV_TYP_CD, T.ABS_RSON_CD,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.APVR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) APVR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'APVR_ROLE_CD' AND CD = T.APVR_ROLE_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) APVR_ROLE_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'DBL_APV_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.DBL_APV_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) DBL_APV_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'ABS_RSON_CD' AND CD = T.ABS_RSON_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ABS_RSON_NM,
FROM AP_APV_LN_GRP_D T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APV_LN_GRP_ID = #{apvLnGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APV_LN_GRP_SEQ = #{apvLnGrpSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.APV_LN_GRP_ID, T.APV_LN_GRP_SEQ
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
